sentences.en: " Oh,'said the man, showing plainly the enlightenment which had come to him.
sentences.cn: “ 哦, " 那人说道, 明显地流露出恍然大悟的神情.

sentences.en: A dreadful enlightenment spread through the mind of Grace.
sentences.cn: 一种可怕的启示掠过了格雷丝的脑海.

sentences.en: A person with enlightenment knows the value of education.
sentences.cn: 开明的人知道教育的价值.

sentences.en: Hence they are full of the most valuable materials for the enlightenment of the working class.
sentences.cn: 因此,它们提供了启发工人觉悟的极为宝贵的材料.

sentences.en: His speech gave us some enlightenment.
sentences.cn: 他的发言给我们一些启迪.

sentences.en: I gained a good deal of enlightenment from him.
sentences.cn: 我从他那里获得许多启发.
我豁然明白了,我忽然开窍了.

sentences.en: I looked to my companion for enlightenment.
sentences.cn: 我望着我的旅伴,等待他的解释.

sentences.en: Isabel looked to Ron for enlightenment.
sentences.cn: 伊莎贝尔希望得到罗恩的启发。

sentences.en: Junior Chemistry Teaching is the enlightenment of chemical education and basic stage.
sentences.cn: 初中化学教学是化学教育的启蒙和基础阶段.

sentences.en: May all beings be free from suffering and attain enlightenment soon!
sentences.cn: 愿所有众生从痛苦中解脱出来并且早日成佛!

sentences.en: P: World events are timed according to global enlightenment.
sentences.cn: 世界事件是同步依照全球的启示.

sentences.en: Stella had a moment of enlightenment.
The newspapers provided little enlightenment about the cause of the accident.
sentences.cn: 报章对事故原因并未解释清楚。
